General.Name: DEEP ENERGY RESOURCES LIMITED
General.Description: Deep Energy Resources Limited, a diversified oil and gas company, provides air and gas compression, gas dehydration, work over, and drilling services in India. It is also in the exploration and production business of oil, gas, coal bed methane, and related engineering solutions. The company provides high pressure air and gas compressors on charter hire basis. It serves exploration and production sectors. The company was formerly known as Deep Industries Limited and changed its name to Deep Energy Resources Limited in September 2020. Deep Energy Resources Limited was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.
